title: Bug 129525Don't Dump Bytecodes to Syserr in LTW
description: Bug 129525Don't Dump Bytecodes to Syserr in LTW
OB: The loadtime weaving system can produce truly massive quantities of output when there's a weaving error, since the system dumps the bytecode to syserr.
EB: It would be much better to produce an ajcore file and just point to it, or use some other log.
